heading: Diablo 4 Patch 1.2.2 Notes
content: These are the Diablo 4 for patch 1.2.2 coming on , including a preview of the Malignant Rings, Season of Blood Adjustments, and Bug Fixes. Rings have been added to the game, one for each class. These are based on popular Malignant Powers from , and are immediately available in both Seasonal and Eternal realms. Obtain them by defeating the The following adjustments have been made for the Sanguine Battery Event. That's it for the Diablo 4, patch 1.2.2 notes. If you're looking forward to the  5 new Malignant Rings, various bug fixes and overall game improvements coming on be sure to stay tuned for updates including how the rings fit into our various If you haven't already, head over to our and select the D4 role in to stay up to date with our content development. Written by:
